trans:
• Never exceed 2 days of treatment.
Drug Administration
Orally.
Swallow the capsules with a glass of water.
Treatment duration
The maximum period of use is 2 days.
If you have taken more IMODIUMCAPS 2 mg, capsule than you should have:
If you have taken too much IMODIUMCAPS, seek medical advice in the hospital immediately. Symptoms may include: increased heart rate, irregular heart rate, changes in your heart rate (these symptoms can be potentially serious and life-threatening), muscle stiffness, uncoordinated movements, drowsiness, difficulty passing urine or breathlessness, or even a decreased alertness, narrowing of the pupils, bloating or constipation.
If this happens, you should go to a hospital where an antidote (naloxone) can be prescribed. You should remain under hospital supervision for at least 48 hours. Children react more strongly to high doses of IMODIUMCAPS than adults. If a child overdoses or shows any of the above symptoms, contact a doctor immediately.
